Hi,

I'm having the same problem but on Max OS X 10.4.9 with the Intel
base=
d Mac and MATLAB 7.4.0 for intel mac.

It seems to me this is really a prob=
lem on how the ctmethods.mexmaci
(or mexmac for the PPC mac) calls the Pyth=
on script for the CTI to XML
conversion. It seems that Python cannot find c=
tml_writer module.

I checked and Cantera IS in the sys.path

Any ideas why=
 this happens?
Thanks

Fabrizio
